thread.title: Celebrate your birthday at this lavish Dubai hotel for Dh1
thread.title_full: Celebrate your birthday at this lavish Dubai hotel for Dh1

title: Celebrate your birthday at this lavish Dubai hotel for Dh1
text: Celebrate your birthday at this lavish Dubai hotel for Dh1 Web Team /Dubai Filed on February 22, 2017 Share Vote The hotel is located in Dubai Marina Are you born in the month of February? If yes, then here is a treat for you. A hotel in Dubai is offering you to celebrate your birthday with them at the cost of just Dh1 for one night. As Wyndham Dubai Marina celebrates its first anniversary, the hotel is offering birthday package. The hotel is located in Dubai Marina. According to the hotel website, anyone booking room for three consecutive nights will have to pay just Dh 1 for the first night. Not just this. The package also includes birthday cake upon arrival, daily buffet breakfast for two, automatic upgrade to a Grand Room, buy 1 get 1 free massage at DreamWorks Spa and 20 per cent discount at all restaurants. Offer is valid for bookings made between February 5 and February 25, 2017. For more information visit www. wyndhamdubaimarina.com Share
